required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.official_title: Cerebral Autosomal Dominant Arteriopathy With Subcortical Infarcts and Leukoencephalopathy Registry Study
clinical_study.source: First Affiliated Hospital of Fujian Medical University

brief_summary.textblock: The aim of this study is to determine the clinical spectrum and natural progression of Cerebral Autosomal Dominant Arteriopathy with Subcortical Infarcts and Leukoencephalopathy (CADASIL) and related disorders in a prospective multicenter study, to assess the clinical, genetic and epigenetic features of patients with CADASIL , to optimize clinical management.

primary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of death from any cause, assessed up to 20years
primary_outcome.description: record the occurrence of stroke and use modified Rankin Scale (mRS) to measure the degree of disability or dependence in the daily activities of people who have suffered a stroke or other causes of neurological disability.

secondary_outcome.measure: The correlation of genotype and phenotype
secondary_outcome.time_frame: From date of enrollment until the date of death from any cause, assessed up to 20years
secondary_outcome.description: Genotype is defined by NOTCH3 pathogenic variant position and phenotype is defined by clinical types and characteristics.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Relatives of CADASIL patients and carriers

study_pop.textblock: Patients diagnosed in hosipital and their's family

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
1. Sign informed consent.
2. Age>18
3. Clinical diagnosis of patients with CADASIL,and confirmed by genetic test or skin biopsy
4. Asymptomatic NOTCH3 mutation carriers
5. Relatives of CADASIL patients or carriers
6. Unrelated healthy controls
Exclusion Criteria:
1. Unable to cooperate with inspectors
2. Serious systemic illness, such as heart, liver, kidney disease or major mental illness
3. Contraindications for imaging examination

facility.name: Department of Neurology , First Affiliated Hospital Fujian Medical University

responsible_party.investigator_affiliation: First Affiliated Hospital of Fujian Medical University
